resources.string: Oooops, cannot enable google drive backup. Check your connectivity.

Setup successful. Your notes will be backed up at regular intervals.
You can check the backups in your google drive account.

Tree-Do, The minimal todo list app.

Author: Martin Bonnin.
http://mbonnin.net

Tree-Do name by Patou.

Cloud logo derived from Cloud Download by misirlou from the Noun Project.

Tree logo derived from Tree by Hysen Drogu from the Noun Project.
